teacher_info.intro:
Places I have lived before!
-Hunan, China 16 years (Hometown)
-Shiga/Tokyo, Japan 2 years (High School for one year and a summer doing internship there) 
-Boston, The USA  3 years and more to come! (Currently attending college here) 
-Geneva, Switzerland 3 months (College exchange and internship)

My interests include making music videos, filming vlogs, bouldering and of course, learning languages!
I study International Relations and East Asian Studies with a minor in History at college. 
I am looking forward to helping you with your language learning journey!

大家好，我叫Panny,来自中国湖南,现在在美国生活。
如果你正在学习英语，我可以帮助你的发音，语法，以及托福/SAT备考等等！
如果你正在学习中文，我可以不仅可以帮助你学习中文，还可以带你了解中国的文化，吃食住行。
期待与你一起学习！

Important announcement: the price will change from Feb 15.
$11 for 28 mintues
$13 for 43 mintues
$15 for 58 mintues
Thanks for understanding.
HI everyone! I am Dali. I come from China.
I have been a professional teacher for 22 years in China and Canada. I am working as tour guide as well. I had been lived in Germany for half year and can speak some German. I like travel and reading. History and literature are my favorite subjects. 
Everyone is different, so I like to design the lessons and set up different topics according to your interests, which will help you promote your level quickly with lots fun during the learning.

Hi 你好 Hola~
My name is Shishi, a native Mandarin speaker from Shenzhen, China. 
I have a BA in Chinese linguistics and speak fluent English. 

My course on italki is based on a communicative approach. We can choose any topics you want. I can also prepare some materials based on your interest. 

I have intensive work experience with people from different countries. I work as a solo representative for an American tech company in Asia & Pacific. (I love my job!) So I can help if you want to have conversation on business related topics. 

I’m also a heavy reader who travels a lot. If you want to talk about more than ‘how’s the weather today’, welcome welcome!

Hi, everyone, I'm Sylvia, I can speak Mandarin(native) and English (IELTS 7.5). 
→Obtained Teaching Chinese as a Second Language(TCSL) Certificate in 2011.
→Majored in English Linguistics(MA), English Language and Literature(BA).
→Patient, easygoing and inspiring as a learning and practicing partner. 
→Interested in traveling, coffee making, diving(scuba/free-dive) and dancing, etc.
Hope to see you in my class~

My name is Baishu, a Phd student in Peking University in China. I major in Medieval HIstory. I speak both Mandarin and Cantonese. I am also learing modern languages like German and French, and classical languages including Latin and Greek. I wish to communicate with people from different countries.

我是土生土长的中国人，在深圳一家公司工作，喜欢文学唱歌以及东西方文化。我有本科学历，以前在学校经过系统的中文知识的学习，有扎实的中文功底。
我为人谦和有礼，同时兼有东方幽默感。

Hello, everyone. I am a Chinese. Native Chinese speaker, I live in Guangdong. I graduated from university many years ago, I work in a company and I am a mother of a child.  in spare time, I teach Chinese online on italki. I like reading novel, writing articles, singing.  

If you attend my course, I will make a learning plan according to the actual situation of your Chinese level and the expected goals. 

We may choose the topics you are interested in or talk about the most popular topics to practice and improve your Chinese.

Hi, guys! My name is Wendy and I come from China. I can speak Mandarin, Cantonese, English and a little Thai. I have a bachelor degree in Teaching Chinese as a Foreign Language in my university. Now I am a  Chinese teacher and have been teaching Chinese for two years. I love teaching Chinese because I can make many friends and I can know different stories and different people.
I worked as a Chinese teacher at a public school in Thailand for two years, and now I am in China and teach Chinese online.

Hello! I'm sharon. My Chinese name is Xiǎo ruǐ. I'm from Henan, China. 
I am a native speaker of Mandarin. My Mandarin pronunciation is clear with neutral accent.
I majored in English Education in college, and now I work as an English teacher in China with five years working experience. I have great passion in Chinese&English learning and teaching.
I love travelling. I have been to South Korea and Israel. I am enthusiastic to be a tour guide and translator because I enjoy helping people.
I'm May,located in Beijing,China,standard native Chinese speaker.full time Chinese teacher.Although I can speak English,but,I will speak Chinese in the class.If you can accept that ,leave a message.

My name is Maura. I base in Sichuan, PRC which is famous for hotpot and panda. My native language is mandarin Chinese. But I can also speak Sichuan dialect. I like everything abut ice, ice-cream, skiing, skating, etc.
And I'm a student of psychology at university. I want to make friends who have the same hobbies.

Hello, this is Yuli. I started teaching Chinese when I was studying in Japan in 2011. Since 2013, I’ve been working in trading field for years. I have working experience in Chinese company, French company, American company and Japanese company. Currently I am a buyer in a Japanese company. I am also a part-time Chinese teacher in a local language school and online. At the same time I’m the Vice President of Education at eStar Toastmasters Club. In my classes, you can learn not only language, but also business skills and public speaking skills.
I speak 5 languages, learning and teaching language is my passion. I've been to 42 cities in China, I'd love to share with you what I saw and learnt.

My name is Edward. I'm from Costa Rica, I enjoy reading as well as writing both fiction and education related articles. I also love cooking, traveling and doing sports. I learned TaeKwonDo from my dad since I was a little boy and recently have started climbing! Very exciting! I like history and watching movies, tv shows and documentaries.

*Dear students, I only teach writing lessons at this moment. I would love to help you solve any problems you come across in writing.

I learned Chinese Language and Literature in the college and completed a master's degree in the US, majoring in Communication Studies. Now I'm learning Science Fiction Studies in the UK. 
Culture and literature are my passion, I especially interested in fantasy, myth, and history. I like reading and writing, and I have published stories and articles in various magazines and books. I will not only teach you the rules of a language but help you appreciate its original culture in the meantime.

Hi there! This is Helen Tian and glad to meet you here! I'm living in Tianjin now, a city nearby Beijing. 
Since graduated from Beijing Language and Culture University, I have been working as a professional Chinese teacher for more than 8 years. 
I'm more Specialized in teaching adults, especially total beginners.

I am a postgraduate of University of Westminster which is located in London. I also have a Bachelor's degree in English from Peking University.  I have worked as a Chinese teacher for more than ten years in Beijing. Now I live in Qingdao, Shandong Province.  I hope I can continue to help more Chinese learners around the world to study Chinese through the bridge of italki. 

我是毕业于坐落在伦敦的威斯敏斯特大学的文学硕士。我也拥有一个北京大学英语专业的学士学位。我在北京从事对外汉语教学工作十多年，现在居住在山东省青岛市，希望通过italki 这个桥梁继续帮助更多的世界各地热爱汉语的人们学习汉语。

Hi everyone, this is Laura, welcome to my Chinese class. I am a professional Chinese teacher with 9 years’ experience. And I am a certified Chinese teacher. I was born and raised in Shanghai, so if you are interested in Shanghai dialect as well, I can teach both. For me, teaching Chinese is not only a job, it is my interest as well, besides swimming and movies.

你好！Hello! Привет всем! I am a native teacher of Mandarin Chinese in Confucius institute with 10 years Chinese teaching experience. I am fluent in English and Russian. My students' age ranges from 6-70. I teach both individual classes and groups.

Hello there,my name is Elena.I am living in Guangzhou which is the city of south China.I am a native speaker of Mandarin and Cantonese.I am a backpacker and I have traveled to many countries and cities.I like traveling because I want to make more new friends and learn more foreign cultures.I also like reading books,writing articles and coffee, and I have a plan to read 100 books for this year.

Because I will move to Shanghai, I will not be able to offer lessons from 2021-03-30 to 2021-04-05.I am very sorry for the inconvenience.
I am Blair, an IT consultant from Chongqing which is the southwest of China. I graduated from Tianjin University majored in English and then went to the University of Warwick for Master’s degree majored in Business. I love travel, delicious food and movies. I am also learning Japanese now. That's why I believe I understand what you are going through.

大家好，我是来自重庆的Blair，我本科毕业于天津大学英语专业，研究生毕业于英国华威大学，目前是一名IT咨询顾问。我喜欢旅游、美食和电影。目前我也正在学习日语。

Notice:if you are late for lesson for 10 minutes, we will not resume the lesson and also the lesson will be charged.

I come from Guangdong province ，a beautiful city in south China.So I also can speak Cantonese,which is a widely used chinese dialect.And I will add some knowledge about this into my lessons.
As a postgraduate student  in  teaching chinese to speakers of other languages in South China Normal University,I have strong passion for chinese teaching.

What's more ，I have many hobbies，such as playing table tennis ，travelling,reading and so on.
